DOC.brief_summary: Exploring immune mediator early pregnancy prospectively may help identify new early intervention increase likelihood success help woman make informed decision regard pregnancy .
DOC.detailed_description: Sera obtain 500 woman undergo IVF five time period : cycle Day 2 , post HCG , Day 24 , Day 28 , and/or Day 35.Aliquots serum test commercial ELISA kit concentration immune modulators suggestive predictive IVF outcome , cytokine ( interleukin , tumor necrosis factor , interferon ) , neurotrophins ( BDNF ) , protease inhibitor ( HE4 ) insulin-like growth factor ( IGF-1 , IGF-2 , IGFBP ) . The result correlate IVF outcome .
